name: Flower and Heart Ring
description:
This ring has been made in eco friendly recycled silver and features two textured hearts and a flower set with a cubic zirconia on a plain band. I have added a lovely patina to show off the detail.

Remember to send me your ring size in message to seller.

As this ring is handmade, please allow for slight variations to the one pictured.

This is UK based shop, please allow extra time if you are outside of the UK
To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

♥ Silver is defined by its pureness. Fine silver is 99.9% pure. Sterling is 92.5% pure. ♥

name: Butterfly disc necklace in fine silver
description:
Cute little butterfly on a fine silver disc. 

Hand made by AngelSilver

Disc measures approx 17mm and comes on a 17" sterling silver sparkly ball chain.

To comply with the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

name: Fingerprint Necklace for Dad
description:
♥ ♥ Fingerprints and names shown are samples only ♥ ♥

Perfectly formed little fingerprint in environment friendly, recycled fine silver on a 22" heavyweight ball chain. The pendant is completely hand made in pure silver from fingerprint impressions.

What a lovely gift for any proud dad, grandfather, uncle, godfather. Who wouldn't love these? 

I will send you a moulding kit and instructions to take the print. Once you send it back to me I will set about making the necklace. Please allow up to 3 weeks to complete your order. If you are in a hurry to get these please let me know and I will do my best to get your order out in time. 

♥ Tiny baby's fingerprints are not fully formed so you won't get the detailed lines in the print until they are about six months old ♥

I will keep your fingerprint on file for 12 months so that you can order additional items without having to take seperate moulds. After this time your fingerprint will be destroyed.

This is UK based shop, please allow extra time if you are outside of the UK

To comply to the Hallmarking Act 1973, all items bound for the UK over 7.78 grams will be hallmarked with my very own mark by the London Assay Office If you are outside of the UK and would like your item hallmarked, please leave a note to seller, but be aware that this could add a few days to the turnaround time.

♥ Silver is defined by its pureness. Fine silver is 99.9% pure. Sterling is 92.5% pure. ♥

description:
